title: Generative AI in Utilities Market is estimated to be USD 8676 Mn by 2032 with a CAGR of 33.1% - Enterprise Apps Today
summary: The article discusses the impact of generative AI in the utilities market, focusing on predictive maintenance, energy optimization, and customer engagement. It explains the applications, benefits, challenges, opportunities, and key players in the industry.
green_innovation: FALSE Green innovation involves creating solutions that contribute to environmental sustainability goals. While the article discusses advancements in the utilities market driven by generative AI technology, it does not primarily focus on environmental sustainability goals or reducing negative environmental externalities.
business_innovation: TRUE The article discusses the introduction of generative AI technologies in the utilities market, representing a new and improved business process that significantly differs from traditional methods, thereby constituting a business innovation.
green_product: FALSE The article focuses on the implementation of generative AI technologies in the utilities market for enhanced operations and efficiency. While these technologies may indirectly lead to environmental benefits, they are not directly focused on designing, manufacturing, or using products in an environmentally sustainable manner as defined by green products.
green_process: FALSE The article outlines the utilization of generative AI techniques in the utilities industry to optimize operations and enhance sustainability. While these processes aim to reduce waste and conserve resources, they do not align with the definition of green processes that explicitly minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability in manufacturing or operational activities.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation, 221210 - Natural Gas Distribution, 221320 - Sewage Treatment Facilities, 221330 - Steam and Air-Conditioning Supply
greenwashing: FALSE The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it provides factual information about the applications and impact of generative AI in the utilities sector, without misleading environmental claims.
